CREATE_TMP_PRODUCTID_TBL.Statement: CREATE TABLE #tmp_ProductId ( [shop_id] [nvarchar] (10) NOT NULL, [product_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL, [name] [nvarchar] (100) NOT NULL, [outline] [nvarchar] (max) NOT NULL, [desc_detail1] [ntext] NOT NULL, [desc_detail2] [ntext] NOT NULL, [desc_detail3] [ntext] NOT NULL, [desc_detail4] [ntext] NOT NULL, [return_exchange_message] [ntext] NOT NULL, [catchcopy] [nvarchar] (60) NOT NULL, [use_variation_flg] [nvarchar] (2) NOT NULL )

INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_ProductId SELECT w2_Product.shop_id, w2_Product.product_id, w2_Product.name, w2_Product.outline, w2_Product.desc_detail1, w2_Product.desc_detail2, w2_Product.desc_detail3, w2_Product.desc_detail4, w2_Product.return_exchange_message, w2_Product.catchcopy, w2_Product.use_variation_flg FROM w2_Product

CREATE_TMP_PRODUCT_PRODUCTVATIATION_TBL.Statement: CREATE TABLE #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation ( [data_kbn] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL, [product_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL, [variation_id] [nvarchar] (60), [translation_target_column] [nvarchar] (50), [before_translational_name] [nvarchar] (max) )

INSERT_PRODUCTDATA_INTO_TMP_PRODUCT_PROD.Statement:
-- 商品名 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'name', #tmp_ProductId.name FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- 商品概要 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'outline', #tmp_ProductId.outline FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- 商品詳細1 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'desc_detail1', #tmp_ProductId.desc_detail1 FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- 商品詳細2 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'desc_detail2', #tmp_ProductId.desc_detail2 FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- 商品詳細3 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'desc_detail3', #tmp_ProductId.desc_detail3 FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- 商品詳細4 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'desc_detail4', #tmp_ProductId.desc_detail4 FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- 商品返品交換文言 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'return_exchange_message', #tmp_ProductId.return_exchange_message FROM #tmp_ProductId
-- キャッチコピー INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'Product', #tmp_ProductId.product_id, '', 'catchcopy', #tmp_ProductId.catchcopy FROM #tmp_ProductId

INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTVARIATIONID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_ProductVariationId SELECT w2_ProductVariation.shop_id, w2_ProductVariation.product_id, w2_ProductVariation.variation_id, w2_ProductVariation.variation_name1, w2_ProductVariation.variation_name2, w2_ProductVariation.variation_name3 FROM w2_ProductVariation

JOIN_TMP_PRODUCTID_AND_PRODUCT_VARIATION.Statement: INNER JOIN #tmp_ProductId ON ( w2_ProductVariation.shop_id = #tmp_ProductId.shop_id AND w2_ProductVariation.product_id = #tmp_ProductId.product_id )

INSERT_PRODUCTVARIATIONDATA_INTO_TMP_PRO.Statement:
-- バリエーション名1 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'ProductVariation', #tmp_ProductVariationId.product_id, #tmp_ProductVariationId.variation_id, 'variation_name1', #tmp_ProductVariationId.variation_name1 FROM #tmp_ProductVariationId
-- バリエーション名2 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'ProductVariation', #tmp_ProductVariationId.product_id, #tmp_ProductVariationId.variation_id, 'variation_name2', #tmp_ProductVariationId.variation_name2 FROM #tmp_ProductVariationId
-- バリエーション名3 INSERT #tmp_ProductAndProductVariation SELECT 'ProductVariation', #tmp_ProductVariationId.product_id, #tmp_ProductVariationId.variation_id, 'variation_name3', #tmp_ProductVariationId.variation_name3 FROM #tmp_ProductVariationId

INSERT_TMP_CATEGORYID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_CategoryId SELECT w2_ProductCategory.shop_id, w2_ProductCategory.category_id, w2_ProductCategory.name FROM w2_ProductCategory

INSERT_TMP_CATEGORY_TBL.Statement: -- カテゴリ名 INSERT #tmp_ProductCategory SELECT #tmp_CategoryId.category_id, 'name', #tmp_CategoryId.name FROM #tmp_CategoryId

INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTSETID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_ProductSetId SELECT w2_ProductSet.shop_id, w2_ProductSet.product_set_id, w2_ProductSet.product_set_name, w2_ProductSet.description FROM w2_ProductSet

INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTSET_TBL.Statement:
-- 商品セット名 INSERT #tmp_ProductSet SELECT #tmp_ProductSetId.product_set_id, 'product_set_name', #tmp_ProductSetId.product_set_name FROM #tmp_ProductSetId
-- 表示用文言 INSERT #tmp_ProductSet SELECT #tmp_ProductSetId.product_set_id, 'description', #tmp_ProductSetId.description FROM #tmp_ProductSetId

INSERT_TMP_COUPONID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_CouponId SELECT w2_Coupon.dept_id, w2_Coupon.coupon_id, w2_Coupon.coupon_disp_name, w2_Coupon.coupon_disp_discription FROM w2_Coupon

INSERT_TMP_COUPON_TBL.Statement:
-- 表示用クーポン名 INSERT #tmp_Coupon SELECT #tmp_CouponId.coupon_id, 'coupon_disp_name', #tmp_CouponId.coupon_disp_name FROM #tmp_CouponId
-- フロント表示用クーポン説明文 INSERT #tmp_Coupon SELECT #tmp_CouponId.coupon_id, 'coupon_disp_discription', #tmp_CouponId.coupon_disp_discription FROM #tmp_CouponId

INSERT_TMP_MEMBERRANKID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_MemberRankId SELECT w2_MemberRank.member_rank_id, w2_MemberRank.member_rank_name FROM w2_MemberRank

INSERT_TMP_MEMBERRANK_TBL.Statement: -- ランク名 INSERT #tmp_MemberRank SELECT #tmp_MemberRankId.member_rank_id, 'member_rank_name', #tmp_MemberRankId.member_rank_name FROM #tmp_MemberRankId

INSERT_TMP_SETPROMOTIONID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_SetPromotionId SELECT w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id, w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name, w2_SetPromotion.description FROM w2_SetPromotion

INSERT_TMP_SETPROMOTION_TBL.Statement:
-- 表示用セットプロモーション名 INSERT #tmp_SetPromotion SELECT #tmp_SetPromotionId.setpromotion_id, 'setpromotion_disp_name', #tmp_SetPromotionId.setpromotion_disp_name FROM #tmp_SetPromotionId
-- 表示用文言(セットプロモーション) INSERT #tmp_SetPromotion SELECT #tmp_SetPromotionId.setpromotion_id, 'description', #tmp_SetPromotionId.description FROM #tmp_SetPromotionId

INSERT_TMP_PAYMENTID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_PaymentId SELECT w2_Payment.shop_id, w2_Payment.payment_group_id, w2_Payment.payment_id, w2_Payment.payment_name FROM w2_Payment

INSERT_TMP_PAYMENT_TBL.Statement: -- 決済種別名 INSERT #tmp_Payment SELECT #tmp_PaymentId.payment_id, 'payment_name', #tmp_PaymentId.payment_name FROM #tmp_PaymentId

INSERT_TMP_USEREXTENDSETTINGID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_UserExtendSettingId SELECT w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_id, w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_name, w2_UserExtendSetting.outline FROM w2_UserExtendSetting

INSERT_TMP_USEREXTENDSETTING_TBL.Statement:
-- 名称(ユーザー拡張項目) INSERT #tmp_UserExtendSetting SELECT #tmp_UserExtendSettingId.setting_id, 'setting_name', #tmp_UserExtendSettingId.setting_name FROM #tmp_UserExtendSettingId
-- ユーザ拡張項目概要 INSERT #tmp_UserExtendSetting SELECT #tmp_UserExtendSettingId.setting_id, 'outline', #tmp_UserExtendSettingId.outline FROM #tmp_UserExtendSettingId

INSERT_TMP_BRANDID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_BrandId SELECT w2_ProductBrand.brand_id, w2_ProductBrand.brand_name FROM w2_ProductBrand

INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTBRAND_TBL.Statement: -- ランク名 INSERT #tmp_ProductBrand SELECT #tmp_BrandId.brand_id, 'brand_name', #tmp_BrandId.brand_name FROM #tmp_BrandId

INSERT_TMP_NOVELTYID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_NoveltyId SELECT w2_Novelty.novelty_id, w2_Novelty.novelty_disp_name FROM w2_Novelty

INSERT_TMP_NOVELTY_TBL.Statement: -- ノベルティ名（表示用） INSERT #tmp_Novelty SELECT #tmp_NoveltyId.novelty_id, 'novelty_disp_name', #tmp_NoveltyId.novelty_disp_name FROM #tmp_NoveltyId

INSERT_TMP_NEWSID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_NewsId SELECT w2_News.news_id, w2_News.news_text FROM w2_News

INSERT_TMP_NEWS_TBL.Statement: -- 本文(新着情報) INSERT #tmp_News SELECT #tmp_NewsId.news_id, 'news_text', #tmp_NewsId.news_text FROM #tmp_NewsId

INSERT_TMP_ORDERMEMOID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_OrderMemoId SELECT w2_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_id, w2_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_name, w2_OrderMemoSetting.default_text FROM w2_OrderMemoSetting

INSERT_TMP_ORDERMEMOSETTING_TBL.Statement:
-- 注文メモ名称 INSERT #tmp_OrderMemoSetting SELECT #tmp_OrderMemoId.order_memo_id, 'order_memo_name', #tmp_OrderMemoId.order_memo_name FROM #tmp_OrderMemoId
-- デフォルト文字列 INSERT #tmp_OrderMemoSetting SELECT #tmp_OrderMemoId.order_memo_id, 'default_text', #tmp_OrderMemoId.default_text FROM #tmp_OrderMemoId

INSERT_TMP_FIXEDPURCHASECANCELREASON_TBL.Statement: -- 解約理由区分名 INSERT #tmp_FixedPurchaseCancelReason SELECT #tmp_CancelReasonId.cancel_reason_id, 'cancel_reason_name', #tmp_CancelReasonId.cancel_reason_name FROM #tmp_CancelReasonId

INSERT_TMP_PRODUCTDISPSETTINGID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_ProductListDispSettingId SELECT w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id, w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_name, w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_kbn FROM w2_ProductListDispSetting

INSERT_TMP_COORDINATEID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_CoordinateId SELECT w2_Coordinate.coordinate_id, w2_Coordinate.coordinate_title, w2_Coordinate.coordinate_summary FROM w2_Coordinate

INSERT_TMP_COORDINATE_TBL.Statement:
-- タイトル INSERT #tmp_Coordinate SELECT #tmp_CoordinateId.coordinate_id, 'coordinate_title', #tmp_CoordinateId.coordinate_title FROM #tmp_CoordinateId
-- 概要 INSERT #tmp_Coordinate SELECT #tmp_CoordinateId.coordinate_id, 'coordinate_summary', #tmp_CoordinateId.coordinate_summary FROM #tmp_CoordinateId

INSERT_TMP_STAFFID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_StaffId SELECT w2_Staff.staff_id, w2_Staff.staff_name, w2_Staff.staff_profile FROM w2_Staff

INSERT_TMP_STAFF_TBL.Statement:
-- 名前 INSERT #tmp_Staff SELECT #tmp_StaffId.staff_id, 'staff_name', #tmp_StaffId.staff_name FROM #tmp_StaffId
-- プロフィール INSERT #tmp_Staff SELECT #tmp_StaffId.staff_id, 'staff_profile', #tmp_StaffId.staff_profile FROM #tmp_StaffId

INSERT_TMP_REALSHOPID_TBL.Statement: INSERT #tmp_RealShopId SELECT w2_RealShop.real_shop_id, w2_RealShop.name FROM w2_RealShop

TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WITH.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
WITH Product AS ( SELECT 1 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'name' THEN w2_Product.name WHEN 'outline' THEN w2_Product.outline WHEN 'desc_detail1' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail1 WHEN 'desc_detail2' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail2 WHEN 'desc_detail3' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail3 WHEN 'desc_detail4' THEN w2_Product.desc_detail4 WHEN 'return_exchange_message' THEN w2_Product.return_exchange_message WHEN 'catchcopy' THEN w2_Product.catchcopy END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Product ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_Product.product_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Product' ), ProductVariation AS ( SELECT 2 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'variation_name1' THEN w2_ProductVariation.variation_name1 WHEN 'variation_name2' THEN w2_ProductVariation.variation_name2 WHEN 'variation_name3' THEN w2_ProductVariation.variation_name3 END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_ProductVariation ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_ProductVariation.product_id AND w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id2 = w2_ProductVariation.variation_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductVariation' ), ProductCategory AS ( SELECT 3 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'name' THEN w2_ProductCategory.name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_ProductCategory ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_ProductCategory.category_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductCategory' ), SetPromotion AS ( SELECT 4 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'setpromotion_disp_name' THEN w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_disp_name WHEN 'description' THEN w2_SetPromotion.description END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_SetPromotion ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_SetPromotion.setpromotion_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'SetPromotion' ), ProductSet AS ( SELECT 5 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'product_set_name' THEN w2_ProductSet.product_set_name WHEN 'description' THEN w2_ProductSet.description END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_ProductSet ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_ProductSet.product_set_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductSet' ), Coupon AS ( SELECT 6 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'coupon_disp_name' THEN w2_Coupon.coupon_disp_name WHEN 'coupon_disp_discription' THEN w2_Coupon.coupon_disp_discription END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Coupon ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_Coupon.coupon_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Coupon' ), MemberRank AS ( SELECT 7 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'member_rank_name' THEN w2_MemberRank.member_rank_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_MemberRank ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_MemberRank.member_rank_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'MemberRank' ), Payment AS ( SELECT 8 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'payment_name' THEN w2_Payment.payment_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Payment ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_Payment.payment_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Payment' ), UserExtendSetting AS ( SELECT 9 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'setting_name' THEN w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_name WHEN 'outline' THEN w2_UserExtendSetting.outline END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_UserExtendSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_UserExtendSetting.setting_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'UserExtendSetting' ), ProductBrand AS ( SELECT 10 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'brand_name' THEN w2_ProductBrand.brand_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_ProductBrand ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_ProductBrand.brand_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductBrand' ), Novelty AS ( SELECT 11 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'novelty_disp_name' THEN w2_Novelty.novelty_disp_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Novelty ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_Novelty.novelty_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Novelty' ), News AS ( SELECT 12 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'news_text' THEN w2_News.news_text END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_News ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_News.news_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'News' ), OrderMemoSetting AS ( SELECT 13 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'order_memo_name' THEN w2_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_name WHEN 'default_text' THEN w2_OrderMemoSetting.default_text END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_OrderMemoSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_OrderMemoSetting.order_memo_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'OrderMemoSetting' ), FixedPurchaseCancelReason AS ( SELECT 14 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'cancel_reason_name' THEN w2_FixedPurchaseCancelReason.cancel_reason_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_FixedPurchaseCancelReason ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_FixedPurchaseCancelReason.cancel_reason_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'FixedPurchaseCancelReason' ), ProductListDispSetting AS ( SELECT 15 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'setting_name' THEN w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_ProductListDispSetting ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_ProductListDispSetting.setting_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductListDispSetting' ), SiteInformation AS ( SELECT 16 sort_number, '' before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'SiteInformation' ), ProductTagSetting AS ( SELECT 17 sort_number, '' before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'ProductTagSetting' ), Coordinate AS ( SELECT 18 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'coordinate_title' THEN w2_Coordinate.coordinate_title WHEN 'coordinate_summary' THEN w2_Coordinate.coordinate_summary END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Coordinate ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_Coordinate.coordinate_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Coordinate' ), CoordinateCategory AS ( SELECT 19 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'coordinate_category_name' THEN w2_CoordinateCategory.coordinate_category_name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_CoordinateCategory ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_CoordinateCategory.coordinate_category_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'CoordinateCategory' ), Staff AS ( SELECT 20 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'staff_name' THEN w2_Staff.staff_name WHEN 'staff_profile' THEN w2_Staff.staff_profile END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_Staff ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_Staff.staff_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'Staff' ), RealShop AS ( SELECT 21 sort_number, CASE w2_NameTranslationSetting.translation_target_column WHEN 'name' THEN w2_RealShop.name END before_translational_name, w2_NameTranslationSetting.* FROM w2_NameTranslationSetting LEFT JOIN w2_RealShop ON ( w2_NameTranslationSetting.master_id1 = w2_RealShop.real_shop_id ) WHERE w2_NameTranslationSetting.data_kbn = 'RealShop' ), Unioned AS ( SELECT * FROM Product UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ProductVariation UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ProductCategory UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SetPromotion UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ProductSet UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Coupon UNION ALL SELECT * FROM MemberRank UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Payment UNION ALL SELECT * FROM UserExtendSetting UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ProductBrand UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Novelty UNION ALL SELECT * FROM News UNION ALL SELECT * FROM OrderMemoSetting UNION ALL SELECT * FROM FixedPurchaseCancelReason UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ProductListDispSetting UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SiteInformation UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ProductTagSetting UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Coordinate UNION ALL SELECT * FROM CoordinateCategory UNION ALL SELECT * FROM Staff UNION ALL SELECT * FROM RealShop )

TRANSLATION_SETTING_FOR_LIST_SEARCH_WHER.Statement: WHERE 1 = 1 <@@hasval:data_kbn@@> AND data_kbn = @data_kbn </@@hasval:data_kbn@@> <@@hasval:translation_target_column@@> AND translation_target_column = @translation_target_column </@@hasval:translation_target_column@@> <@@hasval:master_id1_like_escaped@@> AND master_id1 LIKE @master_id1_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' </@@hasval:master_id1_like_escaped@@> <@@hasval:master_id2_like_escaped@@> AND master_id2 LIKE @master_id2_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#' </@@hasval:master_id2_like_escaped@@> <@@hasval:language_code@@> AND language_code = @language_code </@@hasval:language_code@@> <@@hasval:language_locale_id@@> AND language_locale_id = @language_locale_id </@@hasval:language_locale_id@@>
